import'../assets/css/global.css';import'../assets/css/HeaderDropdown.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import menuIcon from'../assets/images/site/menu.svg';// import axios from "axios";
import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import{Category}from"../contexts/CategoryContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HeaderDropdown(){const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const categories=useContext(Category);const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsOpen(!isOpen);console.log("Toggle");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button categories-button ".concat(isOpen?'close':''),onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:menuIcon,alt:"Menu"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"".concat(isOpen?'open':''),children:categories.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/categories/".concat(item.name),onClick:()=>setIsOpen(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:item.name})},item.name))})]});}export default HeaderDropdown;
